edu.illinois.mitra.starl.modelinterfaces

Interface DroneInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ModelInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DjiController, GhostAerialInterface, MiniDroneInterface, o3DRController

    public interface DroneInterface
extends ModelInterface
    The interface for communicating with aerial drone robots.
    See Also:
    ModelInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void hover()
      Instructs the drone to stop and hover in midair.
      void sendEmergency()
      Instructs the drone to perform emergency recovery (often the same as sendLanding()).
      void sendLanding()
      Instructs the drone to land.
      void sendTakeoff()
      Instructs the drone to take off.
      void setControlInput(double yaw, double pitch, double roll, double gaz)
      Sends the yaw, pitch, roll, and gaz values for the drone to match.
      void setMaxTilt(float maxTilt)
      Sets the maximum angle that the drone should tilt to.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.illinois.mitra.starl.modelinterfaces.ModelInterface

        disconnect

    • Method Detail

      • setControlInput

        void setControlInput(double yaw,
                     double pitch,
                     double roll,
                     double gaz)
        Sends the yaw, pitch, roll, and gaz values for the drone to match.
        Parameters:
        yaw - the rotation about the vertical axis, in the range [-1, 1]
        pitch - the angle of the nose of the drone, in the range [-1, 1]
        roll - the angle of the left and right sides of the drone, in the range [-1, 1]
        gaz - the vertical velocity of the drone, in the range [-1, 1]

      • sendTakeoff

        void sendTakeoff()
        Instructs the drone to take off.

      • sendLanding

        void sendLanding()
        Instructs the drone to land.

      • sendEmergency

        void sendEmergency()
        Instructs the drone to perform emergency recovery (often the same as sendLanding()).

      • hover

        void hover()
        Instructs the drone to stop and hover in midair.

      • setMaxTilt

        void setMaxTilt(float maxTilt)
        Sets the maximum angle that the drone should tilt to.
        Parameters:
        maxTilt - the angle, in degrees
